TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeclarativeCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class DeclarativeCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 使开发人员可以用声明的页持久性格式向网页中添加 或其他服务器控件的目录。

span.span: Enables developers to add a catalog of or other server controls to a Web page in the declarative, page persistence format.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 正如 Web 部件控件集中有面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息, 请参阅类概述), 提供了面向工具的控件, 并且其中的每个控件都必须位于特定类型的工具区域中。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented controls, and each of these controls must reside in a certain type of tool zone. Web 部件控件集中面向工具的部件控件具有两种区分特征:Tool-oriented part controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是帮助用户控件, 使最终用户能够个性化 Web 部件页面上的控件。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它们仅在某些显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain display modes. 是必须位于某一类型的区域中的部件控件, 如 Web 部件控件集提供的区域。 is a part control that must reside in a type of zone, such as the zone provided with the Web Parts control set. 仅当网页处于目录显示模式时, 控件才变为可见。The control becomes visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode. 控件为开发人员提供了一种以声明方式向网页上的目录添加一组服务器控件的方法。The control provides a way for developers to add a set of server controls declaratively to a catalog on a Web page. Web 部件控件集中的目录只是或其他服务器控件的列表, 在页处于目录显示模式时可见。A catalog, in the Web Parts control set, is simply a list of or other server controls that is visible when a page is in catalog display mode. 用户可以从列表中选择控件, 并将其添加到网页中, 这会使用户能够在页面上更改控件集和功能。A user can select controls from the list and add them to the Web page, which effectively gives users the ability to change the set of controls and the functionality on a page. > [!NOTE] > 用户可以将目录中同一控件的多个实例添加到网页中。Users can add multiple instances of the same control in a catalog to a Web page. 使用控件创建服务器控件目录的一个优点是不需要任何编码。An advantage of using a control to create a catalog of server controls is that it does not require any coding. 页面开发人员可以完全使用声明性 (或页持久性) 格式处理控件, 因此可以使用控件的名称。Page developers can work with the control entirely in the declarative (or page persistence) format, hence the name of the control. 控件具有一个有用的属性, 使开发人员可以设置一个可在整个站点中使用的控件目录。The control has a useful property that allows developers to set up a catalog of controls that can be used throughout an entire site. 开发人员可以将属性值设置为包含目录中的服务器控件列表的用户控件的路径, 而不是在控件内声明各个服务器控件。Rather than declare individual server controls within a control, a developer can set the property value to the path of a user control that contains the list of server controls that should be in the catalog. 在运行时, 将在用户控件中引用的服务器控件加载到目录中。At run time, the server controls referenced in the user control are loaded in the catalog. 通过这种方式, 多个页面或站点可以引用同一用户控件来创建目录。In this way, multiple pages or sites could reference the same user control to create a catalog. 更新用户控件的服务器控件列表时, 它将基于用户控件更新所有目录。When the user control's list of server controls is updated, it would update all catalogs based on the user control. 类具有许多替代继承的属性的公共属性。The class has a number of public properties that override the inherited properties. 这些属性中的大多数实际上并不用于呈现控件;它们只会被重写, 以便可以对它们进行特殊代码属性的设置, 以将它们[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]从等设计工具中隐藏起来。Most of these properties are not actually used for rendering the control; they are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 不应使用这些隐藏属性, 因为它们对呈现没有影响。You should not use these hidden properties, as they have no effect on rendering. 这一事实是, 它们在 IntelliSense 中是隐藏的, Visual Studio 中的 "属性" 窗格可帮助开发人员避免错误地使用它们。The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake. 所有这些隐藏属性在各自的帮助主题中都有相应的记录。All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics. 类还具有若干方法。The class also has several methods. 方法为目录中的每个 控件检索一个对象, 该对象使控件可以显示有关每个服务器控件的信息, 而无需创建该控件的实例。 The method retrieves a object for each control in the catalog, which enables a control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of it. 另一种方法是方法。Another method is the method. 此方法根据传递给方法的说明获取特定控件的实例。This method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性 , 控件在`
`元素中呈现。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. 元素对用于在控件中进行编辑的相关控件集进行分组, 并为视觉对象用户代理 (如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理等控件中的选项卡式导航提供便利。 `
`如屏幕阅读软件)。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在网页上以声明方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页。A Web page that contains a control and a control. - 一个源代码文件, 其中包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 使您可以更改页面上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面顶部有两个`Register`指令, 一个用于用户控件, 一个用于包含两个自定义控件的已编译组件。At the top of the page are two `Register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 请注意, 此页具有对控件的声明性引用, 该控件嵌套在声明性元素的适当层次结构中, 如本主题的 "备注" 部分所述。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements as described in the Remarks section of this topic. 元素包含一个``元素, 该元素又包含对标准 ASP.NET 控件和两个自定义控件的引用; 这些控件是用户可以从目录中选择的控件。 ``The `` element contains a `` element, which in turn contains references for a standard ASP.NET control and the two custom controls; these are the controls that users can select from the catalog. 该页还包含编辑功能, 并且在页面上声明了控件。The page also contains editing capability, with a control declared on the page. 此控件可让用户在将自定义控件添加到页面之后, 以及在用户将页面切换到编辑模式之后编辑这些控件上的某些属性。This control enables users to edit certain properties on the custom controls after they have been added to the page, and after the user has switched the page to edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/declarativeCatalogPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/declarativeCatalogPartVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是这两个控件的源代码。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 请注意, 这些控件上的某些属性是用`WebBrowsable`特性标记的。Notice that some properties on these controls are marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 这使控件可以动态生成用户界面 (UI), 以便用户在控件处于编辑模式时编辑这些属性。This enables the control to dynamically generate the user interface (UI) for a user to edit those properties when the controls are in edit mode. 属性也使用`WebDisplayName`特性进行标记, 以指定显示在编辑 UI 中每个控件旁边的标签文本。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下, 可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 添加所有三个控件, 然后使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表将该页返回到 "浏览" 模式。Add all three controls, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode. 这三个控件显示在该页上。The three controls appear on the page. 如果使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表并将页面切换到编辑模式, 则可以单击 "**用户信息" web 部件**控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 (向下箭头), 然后单击 "**编辑**" 以编辑控件。If you use the **Display Mode** drop-down list and switch the page to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见后, 可以看到控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 请注意, 将为`UserInfoWebPart`类的每个`WebBrowsable`用特性标记的属性呈现一个控件。Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class that was marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 如果在编辑 UI 中进行一些更改, 并单击 "**应用**" 按钮, 则可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表将页面返回到浏览模式, 并查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

summary.span: 初始化类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认构造函数; 类中没有声明任何构造函数, 因此在创建类的新实例时, 不会执行任何特殊任务。 The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 在内部使用构造函数来创建类的实例。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 但这种情况不太可能, 你需要在自己的代码中以编程方式使用构造函数。It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控件的预期用途是使页面开发人员能够在设计时以声明方式将其添加到页面中。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为控件的成员的属性未在用于呈现控件的Web部件控件集内的任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此, 不应使用此属性;设置它不会对呈现产生任何影响。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性, 请将代码特性设置为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 在 Visual Studio 中使用控件时 , 属性在 "属性" 窗格或 IntelliSense 中不可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果要使用此属性, 则需要创建从类继承的自定义类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承的属性, 也可以重写该属性并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为类中声明的抽象基方法提供实现。 The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法返回目录中每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 对象是一个对象, 它包含有关控件的基本信息, 包括控件的 ID、对控件的对象引用, 以及从类继承的几个重要属性的值, 例如和。A object is an object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可提高性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录时, 它需要有关其包含的每个控件的信息, 包括标题、描述、图标 (如果存在) 和 ID。When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 无需创建每个控件的实例即可获取此信息, 创建目录的区域将为每个将在目录中的控件调用方法, 并且调用仅返回控件.Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例包含四个部分:This example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个源代码文件, 其中包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含 控件和引用多个服务器控件的控件的网页。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用方法的事件处理代码。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三部分是包含控件的网页。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意, 方法调用方法, 获取目录中的控件说明, 并将详细信息写出到标签。 `Button1_Click`Notice that the `Button1_Click` method calls the method, obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, and writes out the details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下, 可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 可以单击 "**显示 WebPart 说明**" 按钮, 将目录中的控件详细信息写入标签。You can click the **Display WebPart descriptions** button to write the details about the controls in the catalog to the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回对控件的引用, 其说明详细信息与传入方法的对象的值匹配。 The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 通常, 此方法与方法一起使用, 后者用于检索目录中的所有控件的说明。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog. 然后 , 可以通过将单个对象传递到方法, 按需检索或操作各个控件。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例包含四个部分:This example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个源代码文件, 其中包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含 控件和引用多个服务器控件的控件的网页。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用方法的事件处理代码。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三部分是包含控件的网页。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意, `Button2_Click`该方法获取目录中的控件说明, 调用方法来检索与集合中第三个控件的说明匹配的控件, 然后将该控件添加到页面。Notice that the `Button2_Click` method obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, calls the method to retrieve a control that matches the description of the third control in the collection, and then adds that control to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下, 可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 如果单击 "**添加 TextDisplayWebPart** " 按钮, 则会将控件添加到页面, 而无需通过普通目录用户界面 (UI) 添加该控件。If you click the **Add TextDisplayWebPart** button, the control is added to the page without your having to add it through the normal catalog user interface (UI). 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表将页面恢复到正常浏览模式;你添加的控件在页上可见。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode; the control you added is visible on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为控件的成员的属性未在用于呈现控件的Web部件控件集内的任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此, 不应使用此属性;设置它不会对呈现产生任何影响。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性, 请将代码特性设置为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 在 Visual Studio 中使用控件时 , 属性在 "属性" 窗格或 IntelliSense 中不可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果要使用此属性, 则需要创建从类继承的自定义类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承的属性, 也可以重写该属性并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在目录模式中可见时, 属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 在页面中声明控件时, 可以使用`Title`属性设置属性的值。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值, 则使用特定于区域性的默认值描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性用法。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此示例演示如何在声明性标记中设置控件的属性。This example shows how to set the property on the control in declarative markup. 如果未设置属性, 或如果分配一个空字符串 (""), 则会提供默认标题。If you do not set the property, or if you assign an empty string ("") , a default title is supplied. summary.span: 获取或设置用户控件的路径，该控件包含用于该目录的 或其他服务器控件的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to a user control that contains a list of or other server controls for the catalog.

value.span: 带有用户控件路径的字符串，该控件包含一组 或服务器控件。

span.span: A string with the path to a user control that contains a set of or server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许开发人员指定包含一组或可添加到区域的其他服务器控件的用户控件的路径。 The property enables developers to specify the path to a user control that contains a set of or other server controls that can be added to a zone. 如果向该属性分配了用户控件的有效路径, 则会在编译时自动将控件添加到目录中。If a valid path to a user control is assigned to this property, the controls are automatically added to the catalog at compile time. 属性可以很有用, 因为它提供了一种方法, 用于在多个不同的页面或站点上打包和重用一组可用控件。The property can be useful because it provides a way to package and reuse a set of available controls across many different pages or sites. 开发人员可以使用此属性指向引用整个控件集的用户控件, 而不是在目录中为每个要提供目录的页面手动声明每个控件。Rather than manually declaring each control in a catalog for every page that wants to provide a catalog, developers can use this property to point to a user control that references an entire set of controls. 此外, 属性可以与在网页上的``元素中显式声明的控件一起使用。Also, the property can be used along with controls that are explicitly declared within an `` element on a Web page. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 此示例包含五个部分:This example has five parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个源代码文件, 其中包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 其他用户控件, 其中包含对自定义控件的引用, 并且由网页上的属性引用。Another user control that contains references to the custom controls, and is referenced by the property on the Web page. - 包含控件的网页, 以及引用包含自定义控件的用户控件的控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references the user control containing the custom controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 此代码示例的第三部分是包含自定义控件的用户控件, 并由属性引用。The third part of the code example is the user control that contains the custom controls, and is referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/WebUserControlCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/WebUserControlVB.ascx#5)] 该示例的第四部分是包含控件的网页。The fourth part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意, 属性在页的标记中以声明方式设置; 当用户单击在页面处于目录显示模式时公开的按钮时, 还可以通过编程方式设置该属性值。Notice that the property is set declaratively in the markup of the page; the property value can also be set programmatically when the user clicks a button that is exposed when the page is in catalog display mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_UserControlListCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_UserControlListVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下, 可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 单击 "**更新 WebPartsListUserControlPath" 属性**按钮, 无需在文本框中输入值。Click the **Update WebPartsListUserControlPath property** button, without entering a value in the text box. 请注意, 为属性分配了空字符串 (""), 将更新目录, 并且仅在页中显式声明的控件保留在目录中。Notice that with an empty string ("") assigned to the property, the catalog is updated and only the control that is explicitly declared in the page remains in the catalog. 如果在文本框中键入包含控件的用户控件的名称, 然后再次单击 "**更新 WebPartsListUserControlPath" 属性** 按钮, 属性现在再次指向用户控件,其他控件再次出现在目录中。If you type the name of the user control that contains the controls in the text box, and click the **Update WebPartsListUserControlPath property** button again, the property now points to the user control again, and the additional controls reappear in the catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的模板包含在网页上作为目录的一部分声明的控件。The property references the template that contains controls declared on a Web page as part of a catalog. 在区域内声明性元素的层次结构中 , ``属性由元素表示, 该元素是``元素的子元素, 并且包含分类.In the hierarchy of declarative elements within a zone, the property is represented by the `` element, which is a child element of the `` element, and contains all explicitly declared server controls in a catalog. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性用法。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码演示如何在声明性``标记中的``元素内插入元素。This code shows how to insert the `` element within an `` element in declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为控件的成员的属性未在用于呈现控件的Web部件控件集内的任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此, 不应使用此属性;设置它不会对呈现产生任何影响。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性, 请将代码特性设置为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 在 Visual Studio 中使用控件时 , 属性在 "属性" 窗格或 IntelliSense 中不可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果要使用此属性, 则需要创建从类继承的自定义类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承的属性, 也可以重写该属性并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
